description.value:
Totem of Pegasus

Totem Spirit (Respect) — Creation Cost: 7 Gnosis

Spirit Aspect: Freedom / Travel / Transcendence

Individual Trait

The creature who touches the Totem gains the following benefit until the next long rest:

  • Your movement speed increases by 10 feet
  • Opportunity attacks against you are made with disadvantage
  • You ignore nonmagical difficult terrain caused by natural environments

Only one creature may benefit from this trait at a time.

Pack Trait

As an action, a creature touching the Totem may invoke Pegasus' blessing.

For 1 minute, while within 30 feet of the Totem:

  • Pack members may move through allied creatures' spaces without penalty
  • Once during the duration, each pack member may immediately move up to half their speed as a reaction without provoking opportunity attacks

This movement must end on solid ground.

Ban — Freedom Above All

Pegasus demands freedom of movement and will.

The pack must not enslave, imprison, or deliberately restrain a creature beyond what is reasonably necessary for safety or justice.

If the pack enforces captivity through cruelty, excess, or convenience, the Totem becomes dormant and all its benefits cease.

To restore the Totem, the pack leader must reinvest the required Gnosis cost to reaffirm the bond.

If the pack repeatedly or egregiously violates this Ban, Pegasus may withdraw entirely, permanently severing itself from the Totem at the Storyteller's discretion.

Totem rules: Only one Totem per pack; benefits do not stack; a dormant Totem provides no benefits. Once a Totem benefit is used, it cannot be used again until after a long rest. Interacting with a Totem requires 1 action while touching it; choose either the Individual Trait or the Pack Trait.
